images.caption: Figure 1:Motivating example illustrating the gap between static and interactive code generation.

Figure 2:Overview of theWebVIAframework, which comprises three components: (a) an exploration agent to capture multi-state UI screenshots; (b) a UI2Code model to generate interactive code; (c) a validation module to verify the interactivity.
Figure 3:Correlation between the mean interaction trace length and the overall exploration score across our WebVIA-Agent and various VLMs.
Figure 4:Overview of the webpage synthesis process in the WebVIA framework.
